DC.Text_UI_LeaderboardSheet_RankGuideDesc:
-  Earn ‘Adventure Points’ by exploring the High-Roller dungeons.

-  Accumulate ‘Adventure Points’ to earn a ‘Seasonal Title’​.

-  Rewards are given at the end of the season based on your final title.

-  Your in-game name and border will reflect your seasonal title.​
​
-  An Adventure Point entry fee is subtracted from your total
     based on your current Title each time you enter a dungeon.

<ImportantPopupText>-  Earned rewards are given to the characters in the following season.</>
<ImportantPopupText>     Please do not delete your character until the reward is redeemed.</>
<ImportantPopupText>     If a character is deleted prior to granting of the reward, the earned reward cannot be claimed.</>

DC.Text_UI_WB_LeaderboardDetailPopup_Desc:
- Earn a ‘Seasonal Title’ through the dungeons.​

- Your Title is determined by the amount of Adventure Points (AP)
you accumulate during the season.​

- A separate ‘Title’ is calculated for each dungeon.
Your highest title is always displayed for your adventurer.​

- Earn AP by killing monsters, enemy players, opening chests and
escaping the dungeons.
AP is also determined by the value of the treasure loot that you
extract from the dungeons.
Going deeper into the dungeons, killing bosses and sub-bosses,
and looting rare chests give higher AP. ​

- An AP entry fee is subtracted from your total based on
your current Title each time you enter a dungeon. ​

- Dying in the dungeons forfeits all AP from that session.​

- Your in-game name and border will reflect your highest seasonal title.​

Pardon me lord, did you check your loadout? You’ll be placed into a dungeon based on the gear scores of your party members. If a member of your team has a gear score of <GearScore>{0}</> or higher you will enter a more dangerous dungeon. Are you ready to enter the dungeons?

Should you require more time, I can assist in arranging your base gear. We can attend to it right now, if you wish.

Welcome trader. Squires can become 'apprentice traders' and can only buy items from the marketplace. 'Legendary' adventurers can become full fledged traders and can sell items on the Marketplace and access the Trading Post.

DC.Text_DataAsset_Barbarian_ClassInfo_Barba:
The Barbarian is known for his hardy nature, fiery temper, and ability to endure immense pain. His rage and reckless abandon allow him to lead the charge into battle.

Weapon of choice - Anything heavy-duty

+ Extreme Health.
+ Damage bonus with 2H Weapons.
+ Innate magic resistance.

- Slow base movement speed.
- Slow attack speed.
- Slow interaction speed.
DC.Text_DataAsset_Barbarian_Dialog_Barbaria:
'The Brawny Warrior'
Fight with furious anger!
DC.Text_DataAsset_Bard_ClassInfo_BardClassI:
The Bard is a weaver of moving melodies and fantastic tales. They manage to get out of stickiest of situations using their uncanny ability to mysteriously control the mood of crowds and creatures.

Weapon of choice – Rapier

+ Crowd control.
+ Good swordsman.

- Loud.
DC.Text_DataAsset_Bard_Dialog_BardDialog:
‘The Magical Minstrel’
Lift up the spirits!

DC.Text_DataAsset_ClarityPotion_Desc_Clarit: Restores spell memory for a certain period of time.
DC.Text_DataAsset_Cleric_ClassInfo_ClericCl:
The Cleric is a soldier of immense faith. The Cleric uses his sacred bonds to his gods to call forth the protective powers of light and to vanquish the forces of dark.

Weapon of choice - Flanged Mace

+ Casts healing and protective spells.
+ Able to equip some plate armor.
+ Bonus damage to the undead.
+ Adept with many blunt weapons.

- Slow attack speed.
- Slow interaction speed.
- Low damage bonus.
DC.Text_DataAsset_Cleric_Dialog_ClericDialo:
'A Guardian Angel' 
 Lend a helping hand!

DC.Text_DataAsset_Druid_ClassInfo_DruidClas:
The Druid is a spirit mage with a deep connection to nature. Able to wield the powers of the wilderness, they can even transform their bodies to mimic the powers of beasts.
 
Weapon of choice – Staff

+ Able to shapeshift into various animal forms.
+ Utilize nature spells for healing.

- Limited equipment.

DC.Text_DataAsset_Fighter_ClassInfo_Fighter:
The Fighter is a jack of all trades when it comes to combat. Well-versed with a multitude of weapons and armaments, the Fighter can hold his own against anyone.

Weapon of choice - Pretty much everything

+ Can equip most weapons & armors.
+ Well-rounded attributes.
+ Has the ability to sprint.

- Dependent on equipment.
- Cannot cast any spells.
DC.Text_DataAsset_Fighter_Dialog_FighterDia:
'A Master of Arms'
 Adept in all areas of combat!

DC.Text_DataAsset_Ranger_ClassInfo_RangerCl:
The Ranger is an excellent survivalist. With a keen eye and quick hands, the Ranger tracks his enemies, sets traps and ambushes unsuspecting prey.

Weapon of choice - Any long-ranged weapons

+ Quick with the bow.
+ Track enemy players.
+ Set traps.
+ Quickly start a campfire.

- Cannot equip most melee weapons.
- Low damage with melee weapons.
DC.Text_DataAsset_Resourcefulness_Desc_Reso: Increases the regular interaction speed of your character, and significantly increases how quickly you install items such as traps and campfires and skill cooldowns are reduced.
DC.Text_DataAsset_Rogue_ClassInfo_RogueClas:
The Rogue is a master of deception able to silently slip between the shadows to work his dastardly deeds. His dexterous hands enable him to quickly loot riches, pick locks, and disable various traps. 

Weapon of choice - Daggers

+ High movement speed.
+ Quick attack speed.
+ Quickly interact with objects.
+ Can pick locks without a lock pick.
+ Can detect & disable traps.
+ Moves more silently.

- Low Health.
- Low damage bonus.
- Low magic resistance.
DC.Text_DataAsset_Rogue_Dialog_RogueDialog:
'The Sly Assassin'
 Move within the shadows!

DC.Text_DataAsset_SoulHeart_Desc_SoulHeartD: Resurrect an ally by returning their Soul Heart to a Sacrificial Altar.

DC.Text_DataAsset_TrapDetection_Desc_TrapDe: Highlights nearby traps. Highlighted traps can be disarmed by the player.

DC.Text_DataAsset_Warlock_ClassInfo_Warlock:
The Warlock is a brooding manipulator of dark magic. They sacrifice their life force to call upon unknown forces of pain and evil. A worthy adversary proficient in both magic and weapon mastery.

+ Cast curses to debilitate targets.
+ Access to multiple physical weapons.

- Uses health when casting spells.
- Consuming too much health causes death.
DC.Text_DataAsset_Warlock_Dialog_WarlockDia:
‘Master of the Dark Arts’
Unlock the secrets of the occult!
DC.Text_DataAsset_Will_Desc_WillDesc: Increases your magical interaction speed and Spell Power, improves your Buff/Debuff Duration and improves your base Magic Resistance.
DC.Text_DataAsset_Wizard_ClassInfo_WizardCl:
The Wizard calls forth the immense powers of magic to suit his needs. Whether that means summoning a powerful fireball to cast asunder his foes or to temporarily vanishing into thin air, his incantations are a sight to behold.

Weapon of choice - Wizard Staff or Spellbook

+ Cast powerful spells.
+ Meditate to self-refresh spells.
+ Wield magical weapons.

- Slow interaction speed.
- Low physical damage.
- Low Health.
DC.Text_DataAsset_Wizard_Dialog_WizardDialo:
'The Almighty Sorcerer'
 Bending the limits of reality!

DC.Text_DesignData_ActionSkin_FlavorText_Cu: Unwind and enjoy the soothing pleasure of a perfect cup of coffee.
DC.Text_DesignData_ActionSkin_FlavorText_El: Lounging effortlessly in a graceful pose, indulging in a well-deserved break from your adventures.
DC.Text_DesignData_ActionSkin_FlavorText_Ha: Take a seat, drink deeply, and savor the fruits of your labor with the Tavern Master's own special brew, a strong, warming ale.
DC.Text_DesignData_ActionSkin_FlavorText_Pu: The ancient practice of inhalation with a mixture of herbs, rumored to aid in the remedy of many aliments.
DC.Text_DesignData_ActionSkin_FlavorText_Sk: Roast a savory meal while you replenish your strength.
DC.Text_DesignData_ActionSkin_FlavorText_Sl: Delve into the depths of comfort, nestled up in the warmth of a sleeping bag.
DC.Text_DesignData_Announce_Announce_Announ: The server will soon be down for maintenance.
DC.Text_DesignData_ArmorSkin_ArmorSkin_Flav: Wrapped in the essence of the universe, you become a beacon of celestial power, marking you as a true champion.
Wrapped in the essence of the universe, you become a beacon of celestial power, marking you as a true champion.

DC.Text_DesignData_CharacterSkin_CharacterS: Elf
Elf
Elite Skeleton
An Elven warrior from the mystical, forbidden forest lands.
Embrace the Elven ways, where grace and agility stand as a testament to their ancient and mystical heritage.
Bones soaked in the blood of countless enemies, the walking embodiment of death.
The chill of the grave personified, within these frozen bones, this skeletal warrior bears the essence of an eternal winter.
From the icy depths of death, this undead monstrosity trudges forth, spreading the cold touch of doom.
Sworn keepers of marshland secrets, these scaly beings are equally renowned for their intellectual pursuits and their skill in battle.
Guardians of the swamp's hidden wisdom, as skilled in scholarly arts as they are in the lethal dance of combat.
Natural hunters wise in the ways of the jungle with a native skill for survival. Their thick scales provide basic innate protection.
With fangs bared and claws poised, this feral beast is said to have been spawned from a curse bestowed by one of the four major demon lords.
This race of Lycan is said to have received their brown fur as a gift from an ancient forest demigod to help his chosen guardians blend into the woods more seamlessly.

Summoned by a powerful entity to torment a king in his dreams. However, their malevolent influence grew too strong, transcending the boundary between nightmares and reality, ultimately claiming the king's life.

With fur as luminescent as moonlit clouds, these creatures are thought to bear the blessing of the lunar goddess herself. Their existence signifies that of a higher purpose, hopefully one that doesn't end in bloodshed.

Garbed in ancient wrappings, the mummified form carries the whispers of a thousand years with each step. It is both a keeper of old secrets and a herald of primordial curses whispered in the shadows of ages past.
Summoned from the depths of the darkest dreams, the Nightmare Skeleton strides forth as a living incarnation of terror, bridging the gap between the nightmarish and our reality.
Hailing from the rugged Orc tribes from afar, where survival of the fittest is the only law.
Molded by the harsh conditions of the Orcs' homeland, they embody resilience and pure strength.
A walking pile of bones, terrifying to behold.
Frost Skeleton
Frost Walker

Lizardmen

DC.Text_DesignData_ChatRoom_AllowedAllowedI: All items can be linked in this trade chat. Junk quality items cannot be linked.
DC.Text_DesignData_Dungeon_DungeonType_Desc: This dungeon is not for the faint of heart. Pay a steep fee simply to enter this unforgiving dungeon. The monsters are unrelenting and the exit portals are few. If you make it out alive your fame will be known across the lands!
Test your adventuring skills in a dangerous dungeon filled with evil monsters.

This dungeon is for the elite adventurer. Pay a steep fee simply to enter this unforgiving network of caves. The goblins do not take kindly to uninvited guests. If you make it out alive, your name will be written in the annals of history!
A newly discovered cave system found near the tavern. What dangers lurk below?
An imposing snowy peak formed around an ancient crater known as a portal to the unknown abyss. The bitter and relentless cold proves challenging even to the hardiest adventurers.
A vast network of subzero caves and mines home to icy terrors.

Hidden within a shadowy forest, the ruins of a massive castle hold deep mysteries. Fantastic creatures and terrifying monsters await unlucky adventurers looking for untold treasures. If you make it out alive your renown will be endless!
The remains of an impenetrable fortress besieged by a disturbing aura.
DC.Text_DesignData_Dungeon_Dungeon_Abandone: The Ruins of Forgotten Castle - Floor 2 (High-Roller)
The Ruins of Forgotten Castle - Floor 3 (High-Roller)
The Ruins of Forgotten Castle - Floor 2 (Normal)
The Ruins of Forgotten Castle - Floor 3 (Normal)
DC.Text_DesignData_Emote_Emote_FlavorText_B: Show that you have heard enough talking, it might be time to start fighting.
Send a tender kiss sailing through the air, a whimsical token of affection for someone special.
A humble and respectful posture, honoring those before you.
A humble and respectful posture, honoring those before you.
Taunt your enemies in a challenging signal, beckoning your foe to test their might against yours.
DC.Text_DesignData_Emote_Emote_FlavorText_C: Heads or tails? Flip the coin and let fate decide your fortune.
An elegant way to greet or bid farewell.
Silently issuing a warning, making your intentions clear.
DC.Text_DesignData_Emote_Emote_FlavorText_F: Aim your digits like dual pistols, playfully sending imaginary bullets their way.
To express congratulations, applaud enthusiastically. Sometimes, it can also be an expression of madness.
DC.Text_DesignData_Emote_Emote_FlavorText_G: A dance, born from the green feet of goblins and infused with mischievous rhythm by the Kobolds, celebrates the shared culture between the two races.
DC.Text_DesignData_Emote_Emote_FlavorText_H: Express affection with a heart-shaped gesture, radiating love and positive energy.
A symbol of dedication displayed by true line holders who never lost their faith.
Summon the echoes of old as you lift the ancient horn to your lips, its deep and resonant call stirring the air with the power of long-forgotten legends.
DC.Text_DesignData_Emote_Emote_FlavorText_I: An expressive shrug conveying your lack of knowledge or interest.
DC.Text_DesignData_Emote_Emote_FlavorText_K: Take your anger out on the ground. It'll hurt your feet though...
DC.Text_DesignData_Emote_Emote_FlavorText_L: Wordlessly articulate another's defeat or inadequacy.
DC.Text_DesignData_Emote_Emote_FlavorText_M: Scatter gold as if all the wealth in the world belongs to you.
DC.Text_DesignData_Emote_Emote_FlavorText_N: Openly display the sign for 'noob', signaling that someone is on a visible learning curve.
DC.Text_DesignData_Emote_Emote_FlavorText_P: Point with purpose, marking your target for all to see.
Let your drink seep into the ground, symbolizing a silent tribute to those who are no longer with us.
Having well-developed chest and front deltoids, along with well-defined trapezius muscles, at the very least provides a strong sense of confidence.
Seek solace in a moment of prayer.
DC.Text_DesignData_Emote_Emote_FlavorText_S: Show a gesture of mild respect to others.
This salute honors the fallen and inspires the living, a silent testament to the bonds forged in battle.
Place your index finger against your mouth, signaling an unspoken request for silence.
Raise both hands to show surrender.

DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_Ale_0001: A healthy ale made from the finest hops.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_Armet_0001: Molded heavy movable face and cheek plate armor, fully protecting the head from blows.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_ArmingSword_: A thin blade with leather bindings, supporting a firm grip for hasty attacks that feel light to the hand.
Forged from the flames of a mighty black dragon, this sword claws at the target's soul, inflicting lethal damage.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_Arrow_2001: An arrow that looks good at penetrating its target.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_AxeOfRighteo: Every slash carries the weight of moral certainty, a fearsome foe to any who stand in its way.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_BadgerPendan: Channel the badger's tenacious spirit with this pendant, designed to amplify your will.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_Bandage_0001: Bandage used to fix a wound.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_BarbutaHelm_: The helm forged from a single plate of steel, showing off the craftsman skills.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_BardicPants_: A stylish pair of pants that are sure to attract attention at social gatherings.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_Bardiche_000: Crafted with a light wooden base that grows wider in order to support an oversized, curved metal blade nailed to it's head.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_BatClaw: A hefty claw with an ebony black surface gleaming with a wicked luster.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_BatWing: A lightweight souvenir snatched from a startled demon bat.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_BattleAxe_00: An axe with a strong wooden hilt and a single blade embedded deeply in the wood.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_BattleAxe_70: An ancient axe imbued with the screams of fallen enemies, granting its wielder a deadly strength that comes from the echoes of the past.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_BearPendant_: Embodying the resilience of the mighty bear, enhancing the wearer's vigor.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_BeetleWings: Delicate wings of a death beetle, emanating an aura of darkness and decay.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_BladeOfRight: A well crafted two-handed blade, its silver edge cuts through most things with ease and grace.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_BlueEyeballs: Enigmatic blue eyeballs plucked from the remnants of a Dire Wolf.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_BlueSapphire: The shards of this gem shines a deep blue light.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_Bolt_2001: A bolt dedicated to crossbows that is sharp enough to pierce opponents.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_Boneshaper_5: Crafted to honor the immense, in battle it brutally reshapes the bones of the wielder’s enemies.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_BowOfRighteo: This bow, adorned with silver inlay, offers an elegant balance of form and function for skilled archers.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_Bowstring: Well-worn fibers that has witnessed countless arrows fly.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_BraveHunterP: Crafted using both rugged components and mystical textiles, capturing both durability and mystique.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_BrokenSkull: An imperfect skull with visible fractures.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_BuckledBoots: Featuring sturdy leather construction and ornate metal buckles and fastenings for a secure and adjustable fit.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_Buckler_0001: A small shield with a handle located directly behind the boss, guarding oneself in close-quarter combat.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_Buckler_7001: Created by a mad alchemist, using dragon's blood in some of his creations. Beware, its side effects can be just as potent as they are perilous.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_BugShell: A preserved sturdy shell from a death beetle.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_CampfireKit_: A crackling campfire that you can rest near and recover.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_CandyCane_70: The magic of the season is wrapped within every peppermint twist of these candy canes. They're not just a treat for the taste buds but a treasure trove of winter delight and unexpected value.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_CandyCorns_7: Savor the spirit of spookiness with these tri-colored candy corn treats, a sugary staple that adds a dash of fun to every ghostly gathering.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_CapturedMana: Luminescent flakes radiating a soft glow and carrying traces of otherworldly magic.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_CastillonDag: Crafted with a fine blade narrowing to a sharp point. The hilts riveted design ensuring a firm grip.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_CentaurHoof: This ebony black Centaur hoof, once traversing the fiery depths of forbidden realms, still carries traces of blood in its remaining fur tufts, serving as a dark souvenir from a hellish world.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_CentaurMadne: Inlaid with fragments of a centaur’s horn, harnessing pure power.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_CeremonialDa: An ornate dagger with more style than substance.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_CeremonialSt: Carved from blessed wood, its branches unfurl in a graceful mimicry of nature's own design—antlers reaching towards the heavens.
Carved from blessed wood, its branches unfurl in a graceful mimicry of nature's own design—antlers reaching towards the heavens.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_ChampionArmo: It is said, good armor on your back is sometimes better and more reliable than the companions you adventure with.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_ChapelDeFer_: Crafted with reinforced metals showcasing a broad rimmed style helmet with an open face.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_Chaperon_000: Made from wool, nice and thick to keep your head warm while adventuring.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_ClarityPotio: It clears the clouded mind and brings back forgotten memories.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_CloakofDarkn: A cloak crafted using enchanted materials tainted with darkness.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_ClothPants_0: Comfy cloth pants, not offering much as far as protection.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_Club_0001: Simple and effective, this solid wood club is a go-to for those who prefer straightforward, reliable weaponry.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_CobaltChapel: Beautiful craftsmanship, shaping Cobalt steel into a broad rimmed style helmet with an open face.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_CobaltFrock_: A frock shimmering with a mesmerizing blue glow that adds a Cobalt layer of protection.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_CobaltHat_40: A shimmering blue hat that was made from fusing Cobalt into the materials for added strength.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_CobaltHeavyG: Sturdy and advanced hand armor crafted from Cobalt plated steel.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_CobaltHood_4: A hood cut from blue fabric made with Cobalt.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_CobaltIngots: A highly enriched ingot of pure Cobalt.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_CobaltLeathe: Thick durable leather gloves crafted from mixing Cobalt infused materials in the dye.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_CobaltLightf: Made with light durable leather coated in cobalt, enabling swift movements.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_CobaltOres_4: A dirty chunk of rock containing traces of shimmering blue Cobalt.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_CobaltPlateB: Heavy plate boots forged with Cobalt that provide complete foot protection.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_CobaltPlateP: These plate pants made of Cobalt infused steel are like a fortress for the legs.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_CobaltPowder: Powder made by finely grinding Cobalt ore.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_CobaltRegalG: A beautifully assembled padded chest of armor made from combining Cobalt dyes.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_CobaltTempla: A high-quality Templar chest, made with a mix of Cobalt ingots and fabrics infused with Cobalt dyes.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_CobaltTrouse: Cobalt coated woven wool trousers, offering a strong yet flexible fit.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_CobaltViking: Reinforced Cobalt steel covering the face and leather overlaid with a tight knit Cobalt chainmail.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_CockatricesL: Legends speak of the Cockatrice's Lucky Feather, its vibrant crimson hue rumored to hold mysterious powers.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_CopperIngots: A highly enriched ingot of pure Copper.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_CopperOres_3: A dirty chunk of rock containing traces of Copper.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_CopperPowder: Powder made by finely grinding Copper ore.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_CopperlightA: Blending functionality with a touch of wanderlust, this attire incorporates copper elements for durability, perfect for those who travel far and wide.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_CopperlightG: Sturdy gauntlets made of solid copper, providing excellent protection and a gleaming, battle-ready appearance.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_CopperlightK: This Copper Kettle Hat, with its polished, rounded design, resembles a classic kettle, offering a practical headwear choice.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_CopperlightL: Crafted from supple leather with embedded copper fibers, provide a perfect fusion of durability and style.
These boots combine the lightness needed for rapid movement with the added resilience of copper.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_CopperlightO: A mystical tunic interwoven with copper, designed for those who delve into the arcane. It resonates with an aura of mystery and occult power.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_CopperlightP: These pants blend the conductivity of copper with a comfortable fit, ideal for rituals and mystical explorations.
Boots that are reinforced with solid copper plates, offering exceptional protection for demanding terrains and battles.
Reinforced with copper plates, offer exceptional protection, ideal for adventurers seeking both safety and style.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_CopperlightR: Crafted for resilience, these gloves feature copper rivets, suitable for various demanding tasks.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_CopperlightS: This fashionable copper plate armor is heavy and strong, good against physical as well as magical attacks.
Designed for the stealthy and stylish, this hood is made with copper-woven fabric, giving it a mysterious, shadowy look with a hint of shimmer.
Crafted from straw melded with copper, it's a sturdy, stylish choice for outdoor wear.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_CopperlightT: A durable and versatile tunic, infused with copper fibers. Adventurous style suitable for any journey.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_CowlofDarkne: Crafted using forbidden fibers, the cowl's material holds the unsettling after touch of darkness.

DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_CrusaderArmo: Armor that allows for defensive and offensive movements. Protection against physical and magical attacks.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_CrusaderHelm: A distinctive helmet adorned with a cross-shaped visor, a symbol of unwavering faith.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_CrystalBall_: A dense glass ball made of mysterious origins, able to harness and focus magical energy.
Unable to defeat a hopelessly powerful demi-god, an ancient sorcerer sacrificed his life to seal one of the demi-god's eyes in a crystal ball.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_CrystalSword: An enigma to what materials this blade is composed of, allowing magic to flow through it.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_CursedCrown: A majestic crown befitting the ruler of this domain, forever the eternal sovereignty over the darkness.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_CyclopsClub: A massive bludgeon, carved from ancient trees, embodying the might of the one-eyed behemoths.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_CyclopsEye: A colossal ocular relic, a dark souvenir from the realm of one-eyed beings.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_CyclopsRags: Frayed attire from a cyclops, made up of rough fabrics and scavenged materials.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_CyclopsVisio: Infused with the essence of a Cyclops eye, merging the undeniable strength with the mysteries of arcane magic.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_DaggerOfRigh: Featuring minimalistic silver designs, is perfect for those who value subtlety and effectiveness.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_DarkCuirass_: Forged from obsidian-infused steel offering exceptional protection, shielding its wearer from devastating blows.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_DarkLeatherL: Crafted from supple, dark leather that melds seamlessly with the night.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_DarkMatter: Concentrated particles of dark matter, exuding an otherworldly energy that defies comprehension.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_DarkPlateArm: This fashionable dark plate armor is heavy and strong, good against physical as well as magical attacks.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_DarkgroveHoo: Made from treated leather, designed for durability and resilience in outdoor environments, its design subtly inspired by nature.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_DarkgroveRob: A robe crafted from natural fibers, imbued with the essence of the forest. Its earthy tones and soft texture resonate with the tranquility of nature.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_DarkleafBoot: Renowned for their unique blend of flexibility and durability, a testament to the craftsmanship of woodland artisans.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_DashingBoots: Crafted with sleek lines and a polished finish, providing a comfortable and glove-like fit that allows for effortless movement.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_DemonBlood: A vial filled with the corrupted life essence of a demon, pulsating with evil energy.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_DemonDogThor: Needle-like points ready to deliver a painful reminder of the creatures that bore them.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_DemonGripGlo: Crafted with high-tensile materials, augmented by demonic fragments, exhibiting near-sentient tendencies.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_DemoncladLeg: Crafted using demonic remnants, granting it a malevolent sentience.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_DemonsGlee_5: A blade fused with unholy blood is said to become almost sentient, craving destruction.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_Diamond_1001: A beautiful rock that scatters light in a vibrant ray of dancing colors.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_DivineAxe_40: A formidable double-sided axe with silver adornments, combining raw power with a raw power.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_DivineBlade_: A weapon of divine retribution, its hefty weight is balanced by the precision with which it cleaves through foes.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_DivineBow_40: With its silver-infused craftsmanship, this bow is as visually striking as it is effective.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_DivineDagger: The silver detailing on this dagger elevates its appeal, making it a prized possession for any skilled wielder.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_DivineRod_40: With its simple silver inclusions, this mace is a solid choice for those facing undead opponents.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_DivineShortS: A straightforward weapon, its silver edge makes it a dependable choice in combat against undead entities.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_DivineStaff_: Expertly crafted, is an ideal fusion of power and grace, suitable for both defensive and offensive maneuvers.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_DogCollar: Tangible proof of your triumph over the menacing beasts that roam the shadows.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_DoubleAxe_00: This heavy formidable weapon is capable of delivering devastating blows from both ends.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_DoubleAxe_70:
Death comes for us all one day...
Is today that day?
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_Doublet_0001: Lightweight and breathable. Typically favored by those who prefer to blend in.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_DreadHood_40: Crafted using the remnants of the demonic, imbuing it with a thirst for devastation.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_Drum_0001: Assembled from a sturdy wooden frame with stretched hide over both ends, filling the air with rhythmic vibrations.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_ElkwoodCrown: Combining the durability of leather with the elegance of nature, this hat, adorned with branch-like antlers, is a stylish nod to the wilderness.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_ElkwoodGlove: These gloves feature antler embellishments, a mark of the forest's blessing.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_Emerald_1001: A radiant rock of mesmerizing green.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_EnchantedDar: A mystical fabric woven in the depths of darkness, radiating an otherworldly aura.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_ExplosiveBot: A bottle containing a flammable mixture that explodes when ignited and thrown.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_ExtraThickPe: This pelt boasts an exceptional thickness, offering unparalleled protection against the biting cold.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_Falchion_000: A curved iron blade and broad hilt, the curvature of the blade is foreign and enigmatic.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_Falchion_700: Seems the great black dragon has lost a tooth... No matter, it will continue its bloody purpose.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_FalchionofHo: There is no question of honor or skill for those whom wield this blade.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_FangsofDeath: Necklace crafted using a unique combination of teeth acquired from different beasts.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_FeatheredHat: A fashionable hat crafted with soft, silky feathers.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_FellingAxe_0: Forged with aged wood and sturdy metal, it's rigid blade can cut through most surface.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_FellingAxe_7: Through a bond that transcended realms, a guardian of souls granted a mortal companion this enchanted axe.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_FineCuirass_: This armor makes living in impossible situations suddenly possible. Plate armor, uncomfortable to wear and quite heavy.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_FireflyAbdom: A preserved firefly's abdomen, emitting a radiant beacon of light.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_FlangedMace_: A slow and heavy mace designed with crown-shaped blunt edges, supporting even reckless swings.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_Flute_0001: It is carefully carved into a slender frame made of treated cedar.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_ForestBoots_: The boots' color palette is designed to blend harmoniously with forest surroundings.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_ForestHood_0: A hood that looks like it can hide well in the leaves.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_FoulBoots_40: Assembled from the tail fibers of a centaur, augmented with maggots, and activated by demonic elements.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_FoxPendant_3: Designed to enhance ones nimbleness, echoing the fox’s swift and graceful movements.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_FranciscaAxe: A Lightweight small throwing axe that can take out enemies from a distance.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_Frock_0001: Made with broadcloth, a much heavier wool. Humble and modest.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_FrostAmulet_: Radiating a frosty aura, allowing one to deliver more potent sharpness to their physical blows.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_FrostStoneIn: A highly enriched ingot of pure Froststone, it maintains an unyielding cold even in the fiercest heat.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_FrostStoneOr: A chunk of raw material that pulses with the eternal cold of the frozen abyss.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_FrostStonePo: Powder made by finely grinding Froststone ore.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_FrostWyvernC: These razor-sharp talons, forged from glacial ice, are as formidable as the beasts that wield them.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_FrostWyvernE: Mystical egg, cool to the touch, encapsulating the delicate balance of fragility and resilience.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_FrostWyverns: A dense, frost-encrusted layer torn from the icy beast's form. It gleams with the frozen essence of the abyss, a testament to the Wyvern's mastery over the icy expanse.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_FrostlightAb: A striking set of plate armor forged from a rare ore that pulses with eternal frost, providing both a stalwart defense and an intimidating presence.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_FrostlightAk: A quilted armor pulsing with the cold of the frozen abyss, offering flexible protection that adapts to the wearer's movements.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_FrostlightCl: Crafted from fabrics touched by the eternal chill, this cloak offers a serene yet powerful presence, echoing the quiet strength of ancient ice.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_FrostlightCr: An imposing crusader helm crafted from Froststone Ingots, intertwining the chilling touch of the frozen abyss with the enduring might of the noble and the devout.
Skillfully crafted and imbued with the enduring cold of Froststone, this crystal sword seamlessly integrates magic, transforming into an adept vessel for arcane power.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_FrostlightFe: A charming hat infused with Froststone Powder, merging the perpetual frost of the frozen abyss with the quick-witted finesse of the nimble and clever.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_FrostlightGa: Forged from mystical Froststone, these gauntlets meld the biting chill of eternal ice with a rugged, battle-ready construction.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_FrostlightHo: A sleek hood crafted from Froststone Powder, intertwining the frigid touch of the frozen abyss with dark allure.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_FrostlightLa: This shield emanates an everlasting cold that remains steadfast even in the most intense environments. Its retractable blade and lantern offer invaluable support for combat and exploration.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_FrostlightLe: Crafted from reinforced leather and suffused with timeless cold, these leggings offer agile movement with the glacial strength of the abyss.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_FrostlightLi: Light and durable, these leather boots are imbued with the arcane resilience of froststone, ensuring swift movement through diverse challenges.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_FrostlightMy: Exquisitely crafted and intricately designed, these gloves draw from the frozen abyss, allowing spellcasters to wield their magic with finesse.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_FrostlightNo: A fierce helm wrought from Froststone Ingots, merging the glacial force of the frozen abyss with the primal fury of its bearer.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_FrostlightOr: A flowing robe imbued with the frost of ancient realms, enhancing the wearer’s mystical presence with an ethereal chill.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_FrostlightPl: Provides formidable protection, powered by the icy essence of the frozen abyss, though their clunkiness might slow you down a bit.
Sturdy plate pants forged from froststone ore, integrating the icy resilience of the frozen abyss into every plate and rivet.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_FrostlightRi: Riveted with enchanted froststone, these gloves offer a seamless blend of the abyss's icy power and rugged durability.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_FrostlightRu: Combining thick leather and compact fur lining, these boots are infused with froststone’s chilling essence, offering both warmth and formidable durability.
These leather gloves, inlaid with froststone facets, offer a perfect blend of flexibility and the frigid power of mystical frozen ice.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_FrostlightSp: This spear combines the piercing power of a traditional spear with the icy might of the frozen abyss, making each attack chillingly effective.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_FrostlightTr: Woven from light, enchanted fabric, these trousers are permeated with infinite freeze, offering both dexterity and the relentless chill of the glacial depths.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_FrostlightWa: An ensemble that blends the resilience of the frozen abyss with the natural agility of the wilderness, offering a balance of strength and flexibility.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_FrostlightWi: An exquisite creation fashioned from Froststone Powder, combining the chilling power of the frozen abyss with arcane elegance.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_FrozenHeart: From the lifeless blue heart of the already deceased Wendigo, emanates a chilling aura of ruthless death, pulsating with a faint heartbeat.
DC.Text_DesignData_Item_Flavor_FrozenIronKe: A weathered iron key encased in frost, hinting at locked mysteries buried in the coldest reaches.
