DC.Text_DesignData_LobbyEmote_LobbyEmote_Fl: Treat your senses to the rich, tantalizing taste of coffee.
Nothing marks a special occasion quite like a cake. Beyond its layers of delicate flavors, this cake represents our collective adventures, each bite enriched with memories of camaraderie.
Accept your loss, gracefully bowing out of the battle.
Harness the universal language of approval.
The hunger is real, energetically express your craving for sustenance.
DC.Text_DesignData_Merchant_Merchant_Mercha: Why don't you try out one of my concoctions. It's a blast!
Welcome, in search of armor? You've come to the right place. Here, we focus on strength and durability. Let's get you fitted for the journey ahead.
I am the conduit between the realms, offering to weave increased fortune into the tapestry of your fates.
Games! Oooh I love playing games! Let’s play a simple one you clever human. You pay me gold and I give you whatever I want. Sounds absolutely delightful!
Welcome, traveler. Looking for quality leather gear? Each piece is crafted with care. Perhaps you'll find something that suits your adventures.
Oh my head, that's a long story. By the way, I'd be looking for some nice treats. Lil bits of orange, yellow, and white. Makes a nice match with my noggin. I promise I won't trick ya.
Ho Ho Ho, Adventurer! You may not know me but I know you. My friend here Mookia, the winter Strix, has a sweet tooth. Bring me back candy canes and I will exchange gifts. Be swift!

Ah, if it isn't my favorite adventurer... Quite a change of scenery from the dungeons, isn't it? Fresh air at last, and just in time for the Anniversary celebration. The powers that be have scattered special tokens throughout the lands. Collect them and exchange them for some festive delights!

Select the items you want to as your base gear. I’ll have your base gear ready whenever you need to quickly enter a dungeon. Please be sure to ‘set’ your base gear if you make any changes to your kit.​
Come take a look at my exquisite works!
Welcome to the Tavern. Here, we have good ale and sturdy chairs. Make yourself at home, just don't cause any trouble.
I'll pay you top price for any unique trinkets you can bring back from below.
Gold and silver is my language. How may I help you with your financial needs?
Greetings adventurer, I am traveling far and wide to spread the message of love. Go forth and bring back these sweet colorful treats to exchange for other lovely delights.
So many adventurers, so little time. I need to bust out these weapons as fast as I can.
If you intend to survive below, you've come to the right person.
DC.Text_DesignData_Merchant_StockBuy_Conver: Ah, an excellent selection! It will undoubtedly prove useful in your future endeavors.
Behold, the goods you've decided upon shall turn the tides of fortune in your favor.
Yes, yes come buy my trinkets. Very fair, I would never trick you human. Just take my word for it, no need to check... Heheh
Lot's of hard work went into crafting that leatherwork.
Ooh I can hardly wait to get my hands on those sweet little bites.
Generally I don't sell to the naughty. Oh who am I kidding, have a look at all my wonderful goods. I had them specially crafted from my magical workshop.
Well, well, what do we have here? Celebration tokens! Bring them here, and I'll see what goodies I can conjure for you.
Hopefully you won't need to use these on your adventures.
My needlework is the best there is!
Hopefully it won't give you a hangover.
This brew took a bit of craftsmanship. I highly recommend it!
These items have all been blessed by me in hopes of spreading love and love can be expressed in many ways...
Had to smith these out as fast as I could...
That will definitely increase your odds of survival.
DC.Text_DesignData_Merchant_StockBuy_SaleCo: Now don't go mixing my potions, you never know what will happen!
May the stars align during your adventures.
A deal well struck! Gratitude, human.
I stand by my work, but no refunds!
Just like I said. I'm a master of treats, not the trickster everyone makes me out to be.
I see you've been a very nice adventurer.

Enjoy your well-earned spoils, but beware of shadow-dwellers always lurking and waiting to snatch away your possessions. However, losing one's belongings to those cursed mummy spiders is far worse! Those pesky little beasts can be quite the nuisance.
If you get sick don't blame me.
Excellent choice, now go hence and spread the love.
It'll do the trick but don't expect too much.
DC.Text_DesignData_Merchant_StockCraft_Conv: Bring me some Cobalt ore and I'll happily transform it into a useful powder for a price.
Provide me with the ore, and I'll produce a copper powder that's as fine as it is useful. You won't be disappointed.
The art of transformation is my domain. What shall I brew for you?
Oh, what do we have here... Shall we capture the icy essence of the Frost Mountain in it's finest form?
Ah, your intrigues are never less than opulent. Bring me gold ore and I will gladly transform it into gold powder for you.
Need Iron powder? Just provide the ore, and I'll transform it into powder as fine as any you've seen. Remember, quality comes at a price.
Bring me some Rubysilver ore and I'll happily transform it into a useful powder form for a price.
Silver in your hands? Let's turn it into powder. The process is delicate, but the result is a wonderfully versatile product.
Gather me some cobalt ingots and I will Smelt, shape and craft you the most amazing wears.
Gather up those Copper ingots and bring them here. I'll put my skills to work and create Copper wares that are useful.
Advance and witness the might of Froststone. Deliver your ore, and I will fashion armor as impervious as the eternal ice.
With your Gold ingots, I will forge wares that weave luxury into every detail.
How about I make you a brilliant crimson piece of armor!
There is a familiar face! Supply me with some Cobalt ore and I will quickly turn them into pure Cobalt ingots.
In need of refined Copper? Provide me with the ore, and I'll smelt and craft it into high-quality copper ingots. Let's get started.
You wish to meld ice and stone into something extraordinary? Even the improbable is possible in my seasoned hands.
Supply me with gold ore and with skilled hands, I will smelt you pure gold ingots, traveler.
Welcome back! If you have Iron ore, I can work my magic and turn it into top-quality Iron ingots. Just leave it to me.
Provide me with some Cobalt powder and I can produce a masterpiece I tell you!
Supply me with the materials and I'll craft them into Copper wares that are a perfect blend of practicality and durability.
The scent of leather mingles with creativity. What creation shall emerge today?
Seeking protection with a touch of frost? Provide your Froststone, and I'll incorporate its essence into sturdy leather gear.
Gather your gold materials and bring them to me. I’ll shape and craft them into glorious gold wares.
Bring me some Rubysilver powder and I can create magic I tell you!
It always amazes me that you can extract such a magical metal from such ugly stone.
Welcome! Bring me your silver coins or ore and I'll work them into pristine ingots.
You’re lucky I’m even available to make you some enhanced Cobalt outfits.
Should your copper materials be of a quality that meets my standards, I will consider fashioning it into apparel that's the very definition of excellence.
You should consider yourself fortunate I have time to craft you some superior items today.

You're in luck today. You've brought Froststone, a material worthy of my talents. Let's shape it into a garment that not only meets but exceeds the ordinary—crafted, of course, to my exacting standards.
Hand over your golden materials and watch as I craft them into exquisite golden wearable treasures, worthy of kings and queens.
Ugh, If you really need it I guess I can make you some enhanced Rubysilver outfits.
For a reasonable fee, I shall assemble an impactful weapon.
Ah, you've ventured into the cold? Supply Froststone, and I'll create weapons as piercing and cold as the frostbite wind.
Working with gold always brings a smile to my face.
Good to see you. Iron is a reliable choice. Let me turn it into weapons that are both practical and sturdy.
Welcome, you wish to wield silver? Bring me the material and I'll craft weapons that blend lethality with the appeal of silver.
DC.Text_DesignData_Merchant_StockCraft_Craf: Now that is some high quality Cobalt powder!
This batch of Copper powder turned out exceptionally well. Fine, pure, and ready for use. It's exactly what you were looking for.
The transformation is finished. Your concoction gleams with promise.
An illustrious result of alchemical metallurgy. Your froststone powder is prepared.
Some of my finest milling work. The quality can be felt in it’s glimmer.
The perfect consistency! Ideal for any number of applications. You've got yourself a premium product here.
Ah I feel like a young alchemist working with that wonderful stone.
Your silver powder is ready. Its quality and fine texture are unmatched, suitable for a range of uses.
Dependable and premium craftsmanship, delivered on time!
Your Copper wares are ready. Robust and finely made, they stand as a testament to premium craftsmanship.
Your armor is now ready. Infused with the essence of Froststone, offering icy resilience akin to the endless polar night.
The Gold wares are complete, each piece reflecting luxury and artistry.
Now that there is a beautiful piece of armor!
Now that’s a wonderful metal! There is nothing quite like shimmering Cobalt.
Your copper ingots are ready. Smooth, strong, and shining. Ready for use!
Ah, an exceptional meld of froststone that even the Frost Giants would respect and utilize in their crafts.
Now there is a metal of beauty! Gleaming gold ingots, smelted in marvelous quality.
These Iron ingots turned out perfectly! Strong, reliable, and ready for use. Iron like this is hard to come by.
I always follow through, a true work of art.
Here are the Copper wares you requested. Each piece reflects a combination of durability and fine craftsmanship.
The final stitch is in place and my work is done. Now, my old hands rest.
All set. Crafted for comfort and robust protection, this Froststone-enhanced leather gear is a good ally for your upcoming adventures. Stay safe, friend.
Finished with your gold wares, and they are simply magnificent. Thank you for the opportunity to work with such rare materials.
I'm no ordinary leathersmith. It was tough working in that magical powder with the leather but you can count on me!
Now that there is an amazing metal! There is nothing quite like pure elegant Rubysilver.
Here you go, beautiful right? Silver has a charm all its own.
As expected! Perfection!
Delivered perfectly on time, as always.
I could not have weaved anymore brilliantly.
Voilà, transformed and transcendent! This Froststone garment truly meets the mark—my mark, to be precise. Wear it with pride, and remember who you have to thank.
Each item is a masterpiece, radiating the luxury and grandeur that only gold can offer.
What a dreadful experience creating a working dye with that bloody powder.
A fair exchange. Let my work become an extension of your will.
Your weapons stand ready, their Froststone edges sharp enough to carve through bone and blizzard alike.
What a masterpiece if I do say myself!
The forging is complete. These Iron weapons should prove dependable.
Your silver weapons are ready. Each one is a perfect balance of form and function, crafted to the highest standard.
DC.Text_DesignData_Merchant_StockSellBack_C: I hope you didn't try and concoct this yourself.
Hopefully I can wash out the blood and resell these pieces.
Hopefully you didn't use these too much. Don't worry, nothing a good washing can't fix.
Oooo I'm surprised you survived your journey.
I see you've been busy doing your rounds collecting this and that.
You sure you don't need these supplies? I heard it's pretty rough down below.
DC.Text_DesignData_PlayerCharacter_PlayerCh: The Barbarian is known for his hardy nature, fiery temper, and ability to endure immense pain. His rage and reckless abandon allow him to lead the charge into battle.

The Bard is a weaver of moving melodies and fantastic tales. They manage to get out of the stickiest of situations using their uncanny ability to mysteriously control the mood of crowds and creatures.
The Cleric is a soldier of immense faith. The Cleric uses his sacred bonds to his gods to call forth the protective powers of light and to vanquish the forces of dark.
The Druid is a spirit mage with a deep connection to nature. Able to wield the powers of the wilderness, they can even transform their bodies to mimic the powers of beasts.
The Fighter is a jack of all trades when it comes to combat. Well-versed with a multitude of weapons and armaments, the Fighter can hold his own against anyone.
The Ranger is an excellent survivalist. With a keen eye and quick hands, the Ranger tracks his enemies, sets traps and ambushes unsuspecting prey.
The Rogue is a master of deception able to silently slip between the shadows to work his dastardly deeds. His dexterous hands enable him to quickly loot riches, pick locks, and disable various traps.
The Warlock is a brooding manipulator of dark magic. They sacrifice their life force to call upon unknown forces of pain and evil. A worthy adversary proficient in both magic and weapons.

The Wizard calls forth the immense powers of magic to suit his needs. Whether that means summoning a powerful fireball to cast asunder his foes or to temporarily vanishing into thin air, his incantations are a sight to behold.
DC.Text_DesignData_Quest_Alchemist_Complete: Ah, these will do nicely. I left traditional medicine, much to my brother's dismay. Hopefully he will open his eyes and mind to the power of alchemy.

Thanks to your contributions, I can delve deeper into understanding the unique properties of creatures in cold climates. Imagine if we could unlock the secrets of nature and forge new potions of remarkable potency.
With the information we've gathered, we can now delve deeper into unlocking these hidden secrets.
As we continue to dig deeper, hopefully we uncover more secrets of the horrific cataclysmic event that took place here.

Oh my my, this is fascinating, albeit horrific in its implications. The observations you've made during the transition of the magically inclined individuals shed new light on the nature of the darkness. More research must be done, but to proceed, I will need a few specific items.
Marvelous! The components you've gathered are essential for my next concoction. With your help, we're about to dive deeper into the true power of alchemy. Now off with you so I can focus.
Through the use of mystical elixirs, you have triumphed over adversity and emerged victorious, remember the power of potions.
Looks like you've been busy swatting away those pesky sky vermin! Quite the nuisance, aren't they.

It seems the rumors were true after all. Though the Ghost King may not be vanquished for good, we've certainly bought ourselves some time. I'll delve into my research and see if we can't find a way to make his demise more... permanent.
The chests have hopefully yielded the gear necessary for your upcoming trials. But before you face the beasts of the caves, there's one more challenge to overcome.
In the damp recesses of the Goblin Caves, you've emerged victorious once more. Keep your spirit ablaze, for greater challenges lie ahead.
A triumph beyond measure! This calls for a celebration! I've brewed a special concoction to mark your victory – though I must warn you, it packs quite the punch!
DC.Text_DesignData_Quest_Alchemist_Greeting: Can you believe my brother, the Surgeon, still clings to our father's legacy of medicine? Once I thought the same, but alchemy showed me a different path. Help me gather a variety of potions to prove the power of my art.

Ah, good to see you again. It seems adventurers are increasingly drawn to the cold and perilous zones nearby. As an alchemist, I see this as a golden opportunity to study the native creatures of these regions. There may be valuable insights we can glean for new alchemical concoctions.
Legend has it, fierce wolves guard a secret that could unveil mysteries long buried in time. I won't reveal too much just yet, but I'm counting on you. Time's of the essence, so let's move quickly.

It's no secret that darkness shrouds the halls of The Forgotten Castle, and before you can find answers on how to purge it, you must first uncover what caused it. Venture forth and pay close attention, for every clue you gather could bring us closer to unraveling the mysteries of the darkness within.

While pondering on our previous quests, it occurred to me that the darkness within the castle may possess a sentience of its own. To further our research, we must observe how it interacts with those who wield magic. Your task is twofold: briefly study the magically inclined individuals within the castle while they are still alive, and then assist them on their journey to the other side. Pay close attention during their transition and see if you notice any peculiarities or anomalies.
Alchemy requires more than common herbs and vials. I need items with... unique properties. Don't worry, they're safe. Though my brother would probably disagree.
As family ties unraveled, the quiet companionship of my vials remained steadfast. Take them now, as they have been my faithful companions through solitude's trials.
Amidst the gathering darkness, the spectral menace of winged skulls approaches. Their presence heralds doom, but your courage can defy even the darkest of omens.
The castle's depths hold great peril, for within lurks the Ghost King and his demonic minions. Arm yourself well, for the battle ahead will be fierce and unforgiving.
The path ahead is fraught with peril, but fear not. The Golden Chests within the Goblin Caves offer the gear you need to face it.

Here, amidst the darkness and chaos, your mettle will be tested as you strive to survive against the odds. Remember, every trial you overcome brings you one step closer, as you grow stronger, and you become more prepared for what lies ahead.

As you stand on the precipice of battle, know that you are not alone. Your courage and strength will be your greatest allies in the trials that lie ahead. May fortune favor you in the coming skirmishes.
DC.Text_DesignData_Quest_Armourer_Complete_: I used to be hailed as a hero, yet inside, I was anything but. Crafting armor for adventurers as brave as you, it's my way of making amends.
Your courage is undeniable. Hearing of your battles stirs memories of my own past, times I regret not being braver. I've faced war, but the scars that linger most are hidden within.
Escaping or running away? Let them wonder. You've proven yourself capable, and that's what matters.
The legends of silver are known far and wide, but the secrets of this crimson ore are yet untold.
Here is a reward for facing those scoundrels. Try not to spend it all in one place.
It's remarkable how much one person can inspire another. Your influence has set me on a path of self-discovery and growth. Thank you for being that guiding light.
The ever-reliable adventurer! Your efforts ensure our readiness against the encroaching shadows. Together, we'll make quite the formidable team.
Your ability to evade danger has been tested and proven you are ready.
You provided us with a moment's respite from the shadows. We are indebted to your bravery, Adventurer.
DC.Text_DesignData_Quest_Armourer_Greeting_: Greetings, adventurer! I require Cobalt Ingots. They forge sturdy armor, the type I wish I had possessed years ago. It was a dark period I'd prefer not to delve into extensively, but I will mention that perhaps with more reliable armor, I might have found the courage to confront my fears directly.

They say there's bravery in confronting what haunts you. I've faced battles myself, although in ways I'm not exactly proud of... Perhaps a tussle with the undead will clear your conscience of any skeletons lurking in the recesses of your mind.
They say fortune favors the prepared. What better way to be prepared than to master the art of escape? Ignore the rumors.
As you venture forth into the depths, keep an eye out for the precious Rubysilver Ore. Its fiery hue mirrors the flames of my forge. We could use it for the battles yet to come.
The shadows of the Goblin Caves conceal more than just treasure. Seek out other adventurers lurking within and restore order to these darkened halls.
Prepare yourself, for the elite goblin warriors lurk nearby, eager to prove their strength in combat. But I have faith in you.
Salutations! The shadows and monsters lurking within grow stronger, but so do we. Help me prepare so that we can equip ourselves and our brethren for the trials ahead.
To prepare for our upcoming battle with the Lich, we must first ensure your agility and stealth.
We stand on the precipice of our greatest challenge yet; your bravery is needed more than ever. Time to look upon one of the many faces of death.
DC.Text_DesignData_Quest_FortuneTeller_Comp: I hope you didn't think these items were going in the actual brew. No, no, these items aren't for the mixture itself, but for the fire that heats it. Every detail matters in magical concoctions, even the fuel for the flames.
Your escapes from the caves have shed more light on the alignment of your destiny. Yet, some revelations are best kept veiled, allowing you to navigate your path without undue influence.
Slowly but surely the veil is being pulled back. Embracing your spiritual journey requires patience; rest assured that as you progress, uncovering hidden truths will prove invaluable for your future.

Your presence exudes a heightened energy, as if the very essence of Eba flows more freely within you. But tread carefully, for the path ahead stretches far and the forces of darkness will now sense your strength.
As an adventurer, the path you tread is not without its costs. But today, the fates have smiled upon you. Embrace this boon, for it signifies their desire for you to continue along this path.

Do not fear the unknown. Though the path ahead may be shrouded in darkness, find comfort in knowing there is something much more powerful at play here. The universe has chosen you for a reason; trust in its wisdom.
As the torches dim, so too do the veils of illusion that cloak the secrets of this place. Your journey into darkness has only just begun.
May your path now be free from their entanglements, both literal and metaphorical.
As the night wanes, so too does the grip of darkness. Your bravery has temporarily dispelled its shadowy reign.
As the last echoes of battle wane, the veiled ones' screams rise, a chorus of calls. Are they cries for aid or warnings of your fate?
Are you familiar with the ancient tales that speak of the premonitions accompanying a Strix's visit? In any case, thank you for your help.

Did you catch that? Even the air is buzzing with anticipation, like before a storm. We've got to be ready. Trust your instincts, and let's make sure we're not caught off guard when whatever's brewing decides to rear its head.
The webs of fate are spinning as we speak. Be careful, some paths are venomous.
Within the stars lie the answers to life's greatest mysteries, and it is your destiny to unravel them.
I hope we won't need these, but everyone else is preparing. We should too.
DC.Text_DesignData_Quest_FortuneTeller_Gree: A goblin friend of mine needs a special brew; he's coming down with a nasty case of goblin pox. I need your help to gather the necessary items to help ease his suffering.

It appears our fates are intertwined once again. To better understand your journey, I must determine the accuracy of my divinatory tools. Escape from the caves a few times so I can ascertain which one resonates most accurately with your path.

You're back, just as my crystal ball predicted you would be. Are you ready to start the journey to peer into the veiled realms of possibility? You must proceed by delving into the depths of the Goblin Caves, confronting the eerie denizens that dwell within.

Welcome back, seeker of fate's wisdom. The time has come to delve deeper into the mysteries of the cosmos. To further unravel the tapestry of your path, you must commune with the ancient altars of sacrifice. Offerings made here will attune your spirit to the celestial energies, paving the way for greater, deeper connection to the threads of fate that bind us all.

My crystal ball has shown me a vision of your path; it leads to wealth and glory, obscured by the icy embrace of The Frost Mountain. Find a pile of treasure hidden within its depths and let its riches help pave the way for your future triumphs.

Just in time. Earlier, I was asked for insights into the beasts afflicting these lands, yet the darkness proved too formidable, shattering my crystal ball. Venture forth and procure three of these orbs and some Rotten Fluid for me. I must attempt to transcend and peer into the darkness to try and unveil what the shadows are desperately trying to conceal.

To grasp the essence of light's strength, one must first dance with darkness. Snuff out the torches one by one and let the shadows cloak you in their embrace, for it is within the depths of darkness that true enlightenment may be found.
Beware, for it's not just the web of destiny you face. Amidst the shadows, the spiders weave their traps. Shatter the vessels that fuel their darkness, and thwart their plans to ensnare the unwary.
As the darkness coils around you, remember, it is but a fleeting obstacle on your path to greatness. The time for reckoning draws near.
The icy winds carry whispers of danger as frosty foes gather in the shadows, awaiting your challenge.

I recently received unsettling tidings from an old friend, a Strix named Mookia. She brought word that chatter of doubt surrounds the efficacy of my luck potions. Let us showcase the true power of these elixirs and cast aside any shadows of disbelief from the masses.
After our last visit, I can't help but wonder... Please, venture forth and be nimble, so as not to alert anyone or anything of our investigation. Report any strange findings to me.
Welcome, traveler of destiny's path. The challenge before you will test your luck and mettle. Shall we begin?
Seeker of enlightenment, the altars of ascendance beckon you forth! Within their hallowed halls, the powers of transformation await, eager to shape your destiny with their divine influence.
The spirits have foretold your arrival. If the rumors are true, we must visit the Forgotten Castle to retrieve ingredients needed to break a powerful curse.
DC.Text_DesignData_Quest_GoblinMerchant_Com: Huzzah! You served them da BIG bing-bong, with side of smiggity shming-bop! Hee-hee.
Yip, yip! Me is happy! You've done me proud, me fleshy friend. However, these only seem to be a piece to a larger puzzle. But these isa okies because me likes puzzles!
Yowza, no ears, no pride! Well done, very well indeed. Hee-hee.
By me green skin the fleshy has done it again! Here be your share. No need to check to see if gobo was fair, me promises to never scam you squishy one.
By me pointy ears, ya did it! Gobbo happy happy! Huzzah!
Well, well, well, look who's back in one piece! Ye got guts, I'll give ye that.
Aha! Well done, well done! Now, listen close fleshy. That missing girl ain't what she seems, I tell ya. But that's all you're gettin' from me for now.
Me happy me haves such a strong fleshy fren that gives BIG boom smash. Heh-he.
Ye smashed 'em like ya did those crates, wiz-bang style!
If you were a green skin, me would call you 'shiny-seeker'! Heh-he.
Escaped without a scratch me is seeing! Collect your winnings. Huzzah!
BIG wowza! You have steely nerves and sturdy arms! Take your rewards from gobo, but remember, the caves harbor even greater threats!
You always making me so happy! Here's your shiny reward!
DC.Text_DesignData_Quest_GoblinMerchant_Gre: Eh, just the sort of fleshy me wanted to see! There be a bit of a situation, something peculiar brewing and 'tis not me famous stew. Me wagering a clever fleshy like you could unravel these little knots. Up for some mischief?

Erm, me used to hear stories of a bad, bad wizard that had some precocious information on him. Last me heard, me kin caught him and locked him up till he died dead, dead. Me thinks maybe these special information still hidden away in his cell or secret pocket. Go looks for me and me promises to make it worth your while.
You wanting to disgrace those filthy goblin scoundrels? Them ears be their pride, jus as antlers be to stags, chop, chop chop!

You back already soft skin? Seems like there be a bunch of bafoonery going on in da gobo caves. Wallop the wanderers before they find me secrets! What be me secrets?! Hush, hush for now, all will be revealed in time, heh-he.
Me got a plan, a real sneaky sneaky one. Those critters in the caves – they be messing wit stuffs they shouldn't. Clear dem out whizzbang style!

Yip, yip! Well, look who's back for another round! Think ye gots what it takes to outwit dem gobos? Survive them dark caves a few times and maybe, just maybe, ye'll impress me wit' yer sneakin' skills!
Fancy a little game of fetch? Need a pair of beetle wings and a bug shell. Bring 'em to me, and I might just spill some beans on that elusive lass you're after.

Hey there, me ol' chum! Me got a bit of a job for ya, if ye interested. Them Goblin Caves are overrun with them pesky crates, brought by invaders, and me thinks it's time we give 'em a good bashin'. What say ya? Fancy a bit of crate smashing?

Huzzah, ye back! Me thinks of you fondly squishy one, like dis soft mold to me warm bread. But those elites are not being so nice to ya gobo fren, boo. I bet issa due to me findin' them up to no good! Dark, dark stuff me soft fren. Smash them before they smash us!
Treasures? Me got 'em, deep in caves! Go, go find shiny, but watch out for big teeth! No becoming dinner, understand?
Let’s make a friendly wager, gobo loves to gamba! Take a stroll in the cozy caves, no bruises or scratches, or you will lose!
That Cyclops is no friend to your favorite green skin, challenge the stinky behemoth of these underground domains and make the tunnels safer for poor helpless gobos, heh-he.
Gobo's got big troubles! Creepy crawlies and magic menaces causing mischief in me favorite caves. You brave enough to clean up and find anythings shiny on these bad bads.
DC.Text_DesignData_Quest_Leathersmith_Compl: So, nothing then? Well, I appreciate you looking. The woodsman and I, we've searched far and wide. Maybe it's just an old man's hope, but I will never give up on her.

Even though nothing of significance was found, I still feel one step closer. I am humbled by your courage, traveler. Your commitment to aiding a grieving father speaks volumes of your character. Together, let us persevere in our quest to uncover the truth.
Ah, these are just right. Thank you. She is as adventurous as they come. If you hear anything do let me know.

The truth is, she's not my biological daughter, though she's my daughter in every other sense that matters. I found her as a baby, amidst a scene of horror. May the gods bless her true parents; their final act was to ensure her safety. It's too much for an old man's heart to bear all at once. Her absence gnaws at my soul. Come back later, and we'll continue.

Learning the truth deeply unsettled her. Despite my explanation of her tragic origins, she sought further answers about her identity. Her parents were brutally slain before my eyes, and through this chaos... another baby! Seemingly a twin. It was carried away crying by the very beast that dispatched them. She embraced me, promising to return by the new moon, yet she never did, leaving behind a father's anxious heart.
Well done! Your contribution and the resources you've provided will help fund the search, keeping this old man's hope alive.
Perhaps there's a part of this riddle we're misinterpreting, but we mustn't give up.

Checking those chests was a good idea, indeed. However, let's not stop now. I have a feeling we're onto something promising. Even if we don't find immediate answers, we must persist. There's bound to be a clue hidden somewhere.
We can’t give up now, let’s keep each other informed if there are any further developments.
DC.Text_DesignData_Quest_Leathersmith_Greet: I've heard tales about the Goblin Caves. When my daughter went missing, I thought she might have gone there. Perhaps you'll find something I missed.

Good to see you again. The Goblin Prison... it's a place of mystery and danger. I hesitate to send you there, but desperation compels me. I've searched its depths countless times, but hope dwindles with each passing day. Still, I must ask for your aid. Please, seek out any clues that might shed light on my daughter's whereabouts.

Greetings, adventurer. I require leather caps – any variety will suffice. They'll prove invaluable in keeping our fellow adventurers warm as they aid in the search. If you could procure five of them, it would be greatly appreciated.

Forgive me for bringing this up again, but my daughter's absence weighs heavy on my heart. Perhaps her bow holds the key to finding her. Your consistent dedication has earned my trust, and I feel compelled to confide in you further. There are details I haven't shared yet, but I'm ready to reveal them if it aids in bringing her back to safety.

You should also know that shortly before she went missing, she had an encounter at the tavern with some brutish fellows. They taunted her, claiming she was not human but some kind of Elf. Distressed, she demanded answers upon returning home. I revealed everything, but it did not sit well with her. Perhaps confronting these men might yield more information.
It's no secret that I've been hiring adventurers and funding search parties. However, such efforts are very expensive. Thankfully these icy lands are rich with resources for those who seek them out.

I've been receiving anonymous letters, they offer 'clues' of where to look, leading me to wonder if they're a cruel hoax or something more... The most recent letter reads:

'Within this forgotten place, where darkness reigns, A puzzle awaits, to challenge the brains. Here time has fled and secrets sleep, A concealed path awaits, for those who seek. Deactivate the spiked guardian, reveal more clues, Yet the path it unveils may be far from your shoes.'

I recall the days when I took my daughter on her first adventures. She dubbed them as such, even though they were merely trips to check my traps. Curious as ever, she asked how I always found my way. That's when I showed her the marks I etched into the trees, guiding me to and from. I encouraged her to do the same whenever she ventured out. Given her cleverness, I wouldn't be surprised if she applied this wisdom elsewhere.

Today, we venture deeper into the castle to confront the Ghost King. Some say he is the guardian of this castle, even in his current state. If there are clues to be found within these walls, we must confront him and see if he holds any secrets.
DC.Text_DesignData_Quest_SkeletonFootman_Co: While we're on the subject of bones, I've amusedly listened to countless theories about our bleeding—from magical explanations to scientific fantasies. But between us? I suspect the powers that control our world simply find it visually appealing, delightfully grim.
You've survived! That’s more than most of my acquaintances can say.
Thanks for the coins. I’ll pretend to put them somewhere safe. Looking forward to next year; till then, see you in the dungeons!
DC.Text_DesignData_Quest_SkeletonFootman_Gr: Greetings, adventurer. I’ve got a bone to pick with you. Your constant skirmishes have left some of my companions somewhat disassembled. After enduring a year of relentless battles, I'm taking a well-deserved break and seeking a capable adventurer like you to aid us.
Ever wonder what a skeleton's day job is like? Try surviving these places. It's not all rattling bones and eerie moans. Try surviving where we reign; it might just chill your marrow.
Join in on the anniversary festivities by finding special coins that have been scattered across the lands.
DC.Text_DesignData_Quest_Surgeon_Complete_0: Oh, these bandages are... adequate. Hmm, is that a blood stain? You didn’t use these before bringing them to me, did you?! Of course not, I must be mistaken, my old eyes aren't what they used to be. A thorough sanitization is in order before they're fit for use, anyway.
Well done. This is a stark reminder of the potential dangers of alchemical experiments. The old fool probably drinks those concoctions for recreation.
The use of natural resources like these could potentially help promote faster healing.
Your meticulous approach is just what the doctor ordered.

We may uncover secrets that elude even the brightest minds. But please keep this between us. I don't want anyone getting the wrong idea, especially my brother. His disdain for my research could complicate matters further.
These kits are just what I needed. Precise, reliable – everything my brother's alchemy isn't.

Though his potions have proven to be useful, I still stand by that nothing beats traditional medicine. Your proficiency in both methods is commendable, remember a well-prepared healer is worth their weight in gold!
As you journey forth, may the healing shrines always serve as a reminder of the power of belief, rejuvenating your spirit and body alike.
Much like a surgeon's precise hand, your mastery of the lockpick opens doors to new possibilities.
DC.Text_DesignData_Quest_Surgeon_Complete_1: May your bandages bind swiftly, and your potions mend thoroughly.
Well done, my friend! You defiantly struck a blow against the forces of darkness.

Aha, you've done it! The Skeleton Door yields its secrets to you. Remember, knowledge is power, and you've just added another piece to your arsenal. Keep exploring, keep learning, and who knows what other secrets you might uncover.
DC.Text_DesignData_Quest_Surgeon_Greeting_0: I'm in need of quality bandages. My brother, the Alchemist, might think his potions are superior, but true healing comes from skill and precision, not in unpredictable alchemical concoctions.

There's a myriad of strange creatures out there with ‘potential’ healing properties. The thought of my brother utilizing their venoms and techniques in his alchemy is troubling. By thinning their numbers and possibly finding proof of alchemy's dangers, we can make a case for traditional medicine.
In my ongoing pursuit of quality bandages, I've heard rumors of a nest of unique spider webs deep within the goblin caves. These webs could serve as excellent material for medical purposes.
We're in dire need of restocking our medical supplies. Enter The Forgotten Castle and unearth the hidden caches of healing treasures.

As a man of science, I am having a bit of difficulty understanding the walking dead. Gathering some information for research purposes may prove valuable in the future but beware of the undead that roam the halls. They may be sluggish, but their strength is formidable.
The art of surgery demands the proper tools. Venture into the dungeons and secure multiple surgical kits, we must always be prepared for the unexpected.

In the frosty depths of the mountain, injuries can be treacherous. I hate to admit it, but I'm willing to observe my brother's methods. Acknowledge they might be useful in some situations, but that doesn't devalue traditional medicine. Let me guide you through the art of healing, then go forth and test both methods. Just don't let my brother know.

I may not agree with all healing methods, but one that is undeniable, even for me, is the healing capabilities that come with faith. Seek out the healing shrines and embrace their power, allowing it to fortify you for the challenges ahead.

The art of the lockpick, akin to surgery in its precision and delicacy, is indeed a skill worth honing, particularly in these perilous realms. Seek out the locks that obstruct your path and allow your deft fingers to weave their magic.
DC.Text_DesignData_Quest_Surgeon_Greeting_1: It's time to put your surgical skills to the test. Let's see if you have what it takes to use those kits effectively.
The forces of darkness grow stronger, and we must stand against them.

There's a door, marked by stone or bones; this is no ordinary threshold. It holds secrets, and perhaps even unseen danger. You see, in these treacherous lands, it's not just about brute strength. You need skill, precision, and a bit of old-fashioned know-how.
DC.Text_DesignData_Quest_Tailor_Complete_01: Here's a little something. And no, I didn’t just give you this task so I could have an excuse to reward you with higher quality items than you’re probably used to.
DC.Text_DesignData_Quest_Tailor_Complete_02: Impressive. Here, accept this as a token of appreciation. It's the least I can do for someone who understands the value of refinement.
DC.Text_DesignData_Quest_Tailor_Complete_03: My intuition was correct, but there's more to uncover. However, it will have to wait. Check back later; I have urgent matters. I'm crafting a special garment for a powerful client who won't tolerate delays.
DC.Text_DesignData_Quest_Tailor_Complete_04: Marvelous! Your skills in combat are unmatched, however your style still needs a bit of work.
DC.Text_DesignData_Quest_Tailor_Complete_05: Bravo! We've tailored a sanctuary of wellness within the Goblin Caves, ensuring that style and vitality coexist harmoniously.
DC.Text_DesignData_Quest_Tailor_Complete_06: Well, I'm somewhat impressed. Crafting, you see, transforms the mundane into the exceptional. A lesson I learned in my youth, under unique circumstances.
DC.Text_DesignData_Quest_Tailor_Complete_07: The bitter cold of Frost Mountain invokes memories of a time when my survival seemed uncertain. Yet here I stand, fabulous as ever! Now, onto matters of utmost importance - securing my status at the upcoming elite soirée. Be on your way so I can focus on what I am going to wear.
DC.Text_DesignData_Quest_Tailor_Complete_08: Exemplary as always! I've worked hard to reach where I am, and I refuse to rely on any more handouts from my adopted family. So, lend your strength to make these lands safer, ensuring the wealthy continue investing here.
DC.Text_DesignData_Quest_Tailor_Complete_09: Kudos acquiring the materials. You won't be the one making the offering, for they will know you are an imposter. I have someone in mind whom I will disguise as a potential Dark Follower to carry out this delicate task.
DC.Text_DesignData_Quest_Tailor_Greeting_01: Oh, it's you. Listen, there are some terribly unsightly beings disturbing my creative head space. How can one focus on haute couture amidst such chaos? I'd deal with it myself, but I wouldn't dare risk a crease. Perhaps you could... tidy up a bit?
DC.Text_DesignData_Quest_Tailor_Greeting_02: In search of the perfect ensemble, are we? If you help me out, I will help you. I have just the task that might pique your interest. Fetch copper attire for me and gain my favor.
DC.Text_DesignData_Quest_Tailor_Greeting_03: A socialite like myself often hears intriguing whispers. At a recent masquerade, I overheard tales. I need your help, as I can't risk my attire.
DC.Text_DesignData_Quest_Tailor_Greeting_04: How fortuitous to see you. I trust you're here to assist in maintaining the refinement of our realm. Today's task may not involve needles and thread for you, but it does require a sharp eye and a steady hand.
DC.Text_DesignData_Quest_Tailor_Greeting_05: Today we delve into the realm of self-care amidst the treacherous depths of the Goblin Caves. It’s not a good look to be engaging in combat so deteriorated, have a spa day, you clearly need it.
DC.Text_DesignData_Quest_Tailor_Greeting_06: I'm in need of materials, unique and luxurious. My room at the tavern needs some sprucing up. Please fetch them and do try to be delicate. They’re not just fabrics, they are décor fashion statements waiting to be born.
DC.Text_DesignData_Quest_Tailor_Greeting_07: Frost Mountain offers more than just cold winds and icy peaks. It holds the promise of timeless beauty, its wintry embrace offering a chance to defy the ravages of time.
DC.Text_DesignData_Quest_Tailor_Greeting_08: Amidst the opulent festivities of high society, I caught wind of troubling news. The rumors of some strange monstrous beasts roaming these lands. You know how most nobility are, don't you? They'll vanish to their countryside estates if we don't address this threat swiftly.
DC.Text_DesignData_Quest_Tailor_Greeting_09: We have an intriguing assignment today. You will be procuring materials so I can craft accessories as part of a covert operation, designed to deceive one of the dark lords. By gaining their favor, we aim to secure access and gather information.
DC.Text_DesignData_Quest_TavernMaster_Compl: This map, it's got history, takes me back to the good old days. Maybe one day, I'll tell you all about it over a drink.
Find anything odd? You know, this is reminding me of the time... well, let's not get into that right now. Here's your reward.
Praise the ale gods, you found them! This should keep everyone content until we're restocked.
You've got them, good. I'm beginning to slowly trust you, so I will start to share some of my secrets. You see, long ago I had two close companions... and... I need a drink. Talk more later...
I set up this place as a haven for adventurers like them, like you.
No sign of him, eh? That's a shame. I've resorted to offering free rounds just to keep folks from leaving during the new bard's ‘performance’. I'd rather listen to a banshee wail.

Oh, you found it! Thanks a lot! I overheard the Fortune Teller mentionin' these, and I thought, maybe if I helped her out, she'd, uh, think I'm not too bad. Perhaps she’d even be more inclined to help me out if I ever needed it in the future, ya know.
Back already? You look like you should go thaw out by the fire.
I will warm up some ale for you, I know how it sounds but trust me.
So you've noticed it too, the odd behavior of those creatures? No clear clues yet, but we're piecing together something bigger. I can feel it in my beard.
Interesting, I will take this information to one of the few people I trust. They prefer to remain anonymous for now but might be able to make sense of this.
The information you found is unsettling to say the least. Perhaps a bit of liquid courage to steel our nerves.
The protectors' favor is essential in our battle against this darkness. May their blessings fortify us for the challenges that lie ahead.

Impressive work on your recent triumph! However, it appears that our victory has unveiled a breadcrumb trail pointing to one of the castle's most nefarious adversaries. Take a breather, for the forthcoming battle will test your courage and strength like never before.
Tonight, I'll ensure the tavern is filled with joyous revelry! Alas, it seems the lich's reign of terror persists. The time you bought us is valuable; at least we've gained some respite for now.
The Frost Skeletons won’t trouble us as much now. Warm yourself by the fire, you’ve earned it.
I knew I could count on you. The Collector's favor is settled, and as promised, here's something for your trouble.
Bravo! You’ve conquered the Frost Mountain’s deadliest foes. Come, have a drink with me. I’ve prepared a brew that’s as legendary as your deeds.
Cheers! A well-deserved toast to all your success.
DC.Text_DesignData_Quest_TavernMaster_Greet: You're becoming quite a familiar face around here. I've got a hunch that you're someone I can count on. I seem to have misplaced something—a map, to be exact. Think you can help me out?

I established my tavern by these dungeons to aid adventurers, among other reasons I'll keep to myself for now. Usually, missing adventurers don't raise an eyebrow; it comes with the territory. But lately, even the experienced ones are disappearing. Something's not right. Can you take a look around and should you come across any undead, I trust you'll deal with them.

Funny story, used to give adventurers extra magically preserved mugs of ale to stash in the dungeons for a quick refresh. With the tavern's supply running low – thanks to the free rounds I'm giving out to tolerate the new bard – we could use those hidden reserves. Fetch some to keep our patrons happy until the next shipment arrives.
There are some items I need. Don't ask why; it's a personal matter. Just bring them to me. It's part of a larger picture, connected to my past. Let’s just say it’s a way for you to build trust.
An unspeakable event unfolded, shrouded in darkness that originates from those dungeons, claiming my friends. As you journey, perhaps you'll unravel the hidden clues.

There's a bit of a situation. Our bard, the one everyone actually likes, has gone missing. It’s been over a week. Last heard, he was near the Howling Crypts. Could you take a look? The new bard's awful performance is driving my patrons mad. The sooner we find the old one, the better for everyone's ears.
Looking to make your mark in the frosty expanse, eh? Well, I've got a task that'll chill you to the bone. I need a Glowing Blue Eye from those sinister frost dwellers.

Seems like more folks are flocking to Frost Mountain. Since you've got a bit of experience under your belt, mind testing out the escape routes a few times? Just be sure to dress warm, you wouldn't want to catch a cold!

Hey there, ready for a frosty brawl? Need you to thin out the frosty foes lurking in Frost Mountain. We have a search party heading up there to help look for that missing girl and want to help them out as much as possible.
Monsters in this area are nothing new, but lately, there's been a noticeable increase in their activity. I don't have the time to investigate this myself. I need you to look into it.
The lower-level creatures didn't provide the clues we hoped for, so it's time to aim higher. Deal with the elite and who knows, we might uncover something. And hurry, caring is exhausting.

My place is a haven for those in search of respite, a good mug of ale and answers alike. Seeking clues to the dark mysteries of these lands, uncover the secrets of the Lich within the Forgotten Castle.
As your efforts progress, clarity begins to emerge, though mysteries remain. To confront the encroaching darkness, we must earn the gods' favor. Invoke their blessings at the shrines.
Now that the gods smile upon us, it's time to confront the darker forces. If you need a boost, remember, I'm here with counsel and a pint of ale.
The crypt holds secrets darker than the night, guarded by an entity and its minions. I need you to face the darkness and confront this evil and its servants.
Ah, just the person I needed! Frost Skeletons with axes and maces are prowling the Ice Abyss. We need to thin their ranks before they become an even bigger problem. Ready to warm things up a bit?
I owe The Collector a favor, but I'm too busy to leave the bar. You seem perfect for the job, and I'll make it worth your while.
Adventurer, the time has come to face the deadliest foes in the Frost Mountain. You must slay the Frost Wyvern, its demonic minions, and the ice imps. This will be your greatest challenge yet.
There are a few undead still shambling around, and I'd like you to take care of them. Think of it as clearing the bar before closing time.
DC.Text_DesignData_Quest_TheCollector_Compl: Thanks to your skill in combat, it has made it possible to proceed with my investigation. We are all collectors in our own way, and from what I've observed, you seem to be a collector of extinguishing others quite effectively. What else do you collect, I wonder?
Each item is of artistic and historical importance and will also spruce up my room while I'm staying at the tavern. You continue to impress me, adventurer.
Those pesky creatures will now think twice before pilfering owned items.
Were the challenges greater than you anticipated? You are here now, that’s all that matters.
Your thoroughness is much appreciated. I'll analyze the data promptly. Here is a token of my appreciation.
Ah, you've returned. I was starting to worry. These aren't for me, let’s just say a friend of a friend.
This should help with the search. Please, accept this reward as a token of my gratitude.
Well done, these oil lanterns will help to illuminate the path and guide them through the darkness as they continue the search for that poor missing girl.
You've once again demonstrated your resourcefulness. Keep up the excellent work, for greater challenges await.
Make yourself comfortable by the fire; I'll take a thorough look at these artifacts.
These are just the keys I was looking for; you'll be needing them soon.

I know this may sound crazy because it's no secret that green skin is a trickster, but I have a gut feeling he was telling the truth. I wonder if we should keep trying or admit we might have been played...
You have kept these threats at bay. Our people can now live without fear. Accept this reward as a token of our gratitude.
Your ability to enjoy ales amidst the frosty terrain clearly showcases that you have an adventurous spirit. Ha!
Ah, back already? Let me have a look at what you've brought. Hmm, some of these are a bit bloody, but no worries, I'll have them cleaned up in no time.
In a world where loyalty is as rare as the artifacts I seek, your steadfastness shines as brightly as my most precious gems. Until our paths cross again, stay vigilant and true.
DC.Text_DesignData_Quest_TheCollector_Greet: Good to see you again. I need your assistance with a pressing issue. The land is plagued with an array of frost beasts that threaten to impede my progress for collecting something rather unique. I require your skill in combat to clear the way, so I may uncover the truth hidden within.

I've stumbled upon something intriguing in my studies, something I'm keeping close to the chest. For this, I need some unique artifacts. They're not just for research; they make fantastic décor too. Find these items, and I assure you, it'll be worth your while.
Welcome back! I've got a hand-picked task for you this time. Those pesky Kobolds have been causing trouble, so it's time to make them pay the price.
In this business, sometimes it’s equally important to be not so friendly. Show me you can be as cold as your surroundings by vanquishing other adventurers within The Frost Mountain.

Our objective today is to locate the wooden lift nestled within The Frost Mountain's embrace. Once found, please report back to me with potential measurements and capacity. There's something of great value in there that I'm itching to collect, and I need to explore all my options on the best way to extract it. And no, I can't tell you what it is... yet.
I have a task for you, a rather peculiar one. Gather the items on this list but keep it discreet. We wouldn't want any unwanted attention.
Amidst the frozen wastes lies a challenge of great importance—an expedition to eradicate the elite frost skeletons that plague these lands.
I've heard that the search for the missing girl continues, but with each passing hour, the shadows grow deeper. I want to contribute, and they need oil lanterns to help light the way.
In Frost Mountain, elusive creatures roam, their rare materials coveted far and wide. Gather what's needed, and rest assured, your efforts will be generously rewarded.
Adventurer, remember those lifts you inspected? They're about to come in handy. I need you to extract a trove of rare treasures from the mountain's icy depths.

Ah, it's you. Greetings. I've been collecting unsettling reports lately—cries and screams echoing through the castle. Some whisper of wails trapped within the walls, while others swear they rise from the very depths beneath their feet. Before delving into wild conjectures, let's first collect some keys to get behind seldom-opened doors.

The Goblin Merchant owed me a favor, so he gave me some information about the Warlord possessing a key. It's said to unlock a hidden door or passage, concealed from sight unless one holds that magical key. I'm determined to uncover the truth behind these whispers.

The icy lands once thrived until their greed angered the frosty foes, leading to their demise. Now, these snowbound beings threaten to expand, bringing death and destruction. Your strength is needed to push back such chilling threats.
As you traverse the icy expanse of Frost Mountain, why not take a moment to enjoy a few ales along the way? It's the perfect blend of bravery and brew.
Amidst the chilling winds of Frost Mountain, there lies a quest of great importance: to procure the treasures of the mountain's inhabitants. I think these could prove useful in the future.

Up for tracking down some of these frozen nuisances and turning this frosty tundra into our own personal hunting grounds? I know some of my collections may seem odd, but toes are actually quite popular lately.
DC.Text_DesignData_Quest_Treasurer_Complete: Thank you for your swift and efficient work. You've managed to gather all of them and just in time.
Ah, the pieces of the puzzle begin to slowly fall into place. I wonder if one of my old associates I used to travel the trade routes with might have any leads.

Well done! As you thin the ranks of those spectral fiends haunting the halls of the Forgotten Castle, I can't help but feel we're one step closer to unlocking the secrets of the ritual we've been pursuing.

Oh no... I was hoping they were wrong. It seems these souls didn't die naturally, but at the hands of horrific beasts once believed to be mere legend. The proof of their existence and danger is undeniable. I must research further. Check back later.

I'll count and examine each one with care to ensure their purity. The best part is, even if we find we don't need it for defense against beasts, its inherent value ensures it will always serve us well, no matter the circumstance.
Ah, splendid! Less mimics makes for a cleaner, more trustworthy environment for our ventures. Here’s your well-earned compensation.
Bangles to balance the ledger, wonderful work. While I sometimes grumble about these trips, I can't deny the excitement they bring. Nothing quite like this ever happens back home.
The golden door has been opened; yet I feel its secrets are still hidden from view. I will send our findings to a colleague and see what they think. In the meantime, I have another task for you.

Welcome back from your fiery expedition! Did you happen to pay attention to every little detail down there? You see, no two silver coins are alike in this world—each one has its own story to tell. No offense, but it seems you possess more brawn than brains, but that's why you have me.
Excellent plundering! With each haul from the Golden Hoard, our riches grow evermore. A toast to our evergrowing wealth!
That cave troll certainly put up a fight, but you emerged victorious. Nicely done! I'll bet he had some interesting loot he was guarding.
Nicely done! I'll ensure these gems are stored safely, it's better to be prepared for any eventuality.
The iron door of the Inferno stands open, thanks to you. Venture forth and uncover the truths it hides.
Excellent work! The Ritual Room's casket has been opened. May its discoveries aid you in your quest.
This is the perfect gift for him. Take this reward, and rest assured, the Collector will be amazed.
DC.Text_DesignData_Quest_Treasurer_Greeting: In my line of work, you learn a thing or two about unique relics. We're after some with a history in rituals. As for their purpose now... better left unsaid. Just bring them to me.

I wonder if the ritual associated with these artifacts has been completed already? Seek out clues or any evidence that might shed light on this mystery. The truth may hold more significance than we realize.

Welcome, I trust you've heard whispers of the wraiths haunting the corridors of the Forgotten Castle? It seems their presence may hold clues to the completion of that ritual. Do what you have to do to bring us closer to uncovering these secrets.

Your previous discoveries have led to another breakthrough. It seems we're on the brink of unraveling some of the castle's deepest secrets. Today, our journey takes us to the royal coffins, where you will need to investigate the truth behind their occupants' demise.

What took you so long? Time is the most valuable currency. No matter. As we delve deeper into our research on the perils of this realm, it's becoming increasingly clear that silver may be our strongest defense against the lurking adversaries concealed within the shadows of these lands.

I never have to deal with such things back home. Mimics – the bane of any honest transaction. Deceptive creatures posing as treasures. I need someone to eradicate these frauds. A matter of financial security.
Ever dabbled in commodity trading? It’s how I got started and now is your chance. I require a bangle of each kind. It’s an investment you see.

Remember our pursuit of the ritual artifacts? It appears they hold deeper clues leading to a golden door. I don't care how you get them, just get me those keys. I wonder if the sacrifices and beasts lurking in the shadows are connected. If so, pray that a means to an end lays behind that door. Report back what you find.

Deep within the fiery depths of the Inferno lies the fallen king's throne. Your mission is to locate the throne and inspect it for any unusual markings or glyphs. Every detail could be significant. Return swiftly with your findings.

As we prepare for the battles ahead, remember, it's not just your weapons and armor that need upgrading. Your coffers must grow as well! Let's make some financial gains to ensure we're prepared for the unexpected.
You ever hear the phrase, 'The bigger they are, the harder they fall'? Well, today's your chance to find out firsthand. Plus, who knows, maybe that troll's got some shiny loot to add to our coffers.

I've long held a fondness for gems, both for their beauty and their value. There are whispers that they harbor secrets beyond what meets the eye, secrets that we may soon need to unlock. It's best to be prepared and start gathering them now.
In the depths of the Inferno, an iron door stands sealed. Can you unlock the iron door and uncover what lies beyond? I am looking for something specific.
The Ritual Room houses a casket, its contents are something we need to inspect. Report anything odd immediately.
Adventurer, I need a favor. The Collector's birthday approaches, and I wish to present him with something rare and valuable.
DC.Text_DesignData_Quest_Weaponsmith_Comple: Quite the collection you've brought! These will be perfect for the fusion. Here's something for your help.

Wow, you found it! Not quite how I imagined it, but excellent work nonetheless. I'll start examining what metals or components were used and if it can be replicated. This may take some time, so in the meantime, I may have another task you can help out with.
Still no sign, but thanks to your efforts more are now able to help in the search.
The gold! These will be used for secrets only my family knows. You've played a part in something special. Here’s your reward, with my thanks.
As the hammer strikes the anvil, so too do the echoes of your victories.

Our suspicions are confirmed. I will take our findings to someone I trust. It's imperative that we maintain discretion about what we've uncovered. Excellent work, my friend. Let us proceed cautiously.
Make no mistake, victory demands sacrifice, and it seems you have made enough to satisfy even the Dwarven gods.
Impressive haul! I guess this saying is true after all.
By my black beard, I knew you could do it!
DC.Text_DesignData_Quest_Weaponsmith_Greeti: Ah, good to see a friendly face. I'm crafting a series passed down since my great-great-grandfather, who learned from a dwarf, no less. I need rare weapons to fuse with, five should do. You're aiding a legacy here.

It seems the rumors of beasts of legend within these lands may hold more truth than fiction, judging by the bodies we've discovered. Additionally, whispers speak of an ancient sword hidden within Frost Mountain, said to possess the power to vanquish such mythical creatures. Check it out and let me know if you find anything.
In the frozen depths of the Frost Mountain, beasts of frost roam unchecked. Let’s do our part and help thin out these beasts for the search to continue for that poor missing girl.
Got a job for you. I require two of gold ingots essential for a technique passed down through generations of my ancestors. Hurry now, can't keep waiting.
The strongest are forged in the heart of conflict, may the blessings of the Dwarven Gods fortify your arm in battle.

I've caught wind of murmurs regarding the stone tombs within The Forgotten Castle—whispers hinting at secrets entwined with the creatures haunting these lands. It's high time we conducted our own investigation to uncover any overlooked clues.
Tis the forge of conflict that separates the steel from the slag. Ready yourself, for the trials ahead only the strong shall prevail.
Ever pondered the saying, ‘good things can come in small packages? Let's see if that includes small chests. Let’s find out together.
All your training will need to be applied here. This will be one of the more difficult tasks you have faced, but I have faith in you!
DC.Text_DesignData_Quest_Woodsman_Complete_: You've gathered them all I see, thank you. I pray we find her before winter hits. She makes me feel like I have a fire inside my soul. Oh, uh... Don't tell the Leathersmith I said that please.
Your assistance will pave the way for safer journeys. Thank you for your help.
I can't believe she was right?! This gives me so much hope. Thank you!
I must say, I have no idea how you manage to fight in such cramped quarters. It's a skill I clearly lack! Accept this reward as a token of my thanks.
This sight warms my heart... They're like fireworks for the soul, you know? Anyway, I'll keep these tucked away safely until the time comes. Thanks for your assistance.

It appears those bodies were a real puzzle. The variety of bite marks suggests they were attacked by different creatures. Quite peculiar, wouldn't you say? Good work on your end too. Hopefully soon something starts to make sense.
Have faith, our efforts are bringing us closer to our goals.
Your navigation through the castle is truly impressive. The mere thought of those mazes and tight corridors turns my stomach.
You have uncovered valuable insights. Remember, in the darkest of nights, a well-tended campfire can be both a source of warmth and a beacon of hope.
Ah, there are few things as comforting as the warmth of a crackling campfire amidst the chill of the frost.
Though we can never bring back the tribe they've slain, our actions ensure their spirits find peace, knowing justice has been served.
May this experience fortify you for the trials that lie ahead, as you delve deeper into the mysteries of this icy domain.
DC.Text_DesignData_Quest_Woodsman_Greeting_: Ever hear about how we red-beards got our color? Too many nights by the campfire, that's how! Speaking of which, I need campfire kits. I am not sure if you heard but the Leathersmith’s daughter is still missing and we need these campfires to help aid us in our search.

A lot of people are helping in the search for the Leathersmiths lost daughter, unfortunately not all of them are skilled adventures like yourself. Please help clear the way making it safe for those who are less skilled.
Good to see you again! Been scouring for any leads on the Leathersmith's missing daughter. Got desperate and even visited the fortune teller. Let's check the location she suggested for clues.
I find myself in a quandary once more. The castle holds the answers we seek, but... well, the thought of confronting others in such enclosed spaces unnerves me. That’s where you come in.
Did I ever tell you about my love for explosions? It's like music to my ears, much like a crackling campfire. Anyway, I need your help gathering some explosive bottles.

I'm sure you've been hearing all kinds of stories by now about those bodies found, slain by a beast of some sort, but no one can agree on what it was. They asked me to come take a look at some of the bodies since I'm very familiar with wild beasts. In the meantime, could you check out the Demon Bat pit? I'll meet you back here later.
I've received a curious message leading us to the depths of the Forgotten Castle. It may hold answers we seek. Clear the path of any fiends you encounter, but tread carefully.
Back to the castle's depths, I see. Keep your wits sharp and watch for clues left by past adventurers, especially around the escape routes. Try your best not to die.
Keep those senses keen and be on the lookout for any signs of spectral activity. The shadows may hold secrets to our next destination.

Amidst your many adventures, survival can become challenging. Gather 'round and warm yourself and any companions. These dancing flames provide comfort, and their warm glow pierces the night like a beacon, visible from long distances. They may even serve as a guiding light to those who might be lost.

As you delve deeper into the mountain's depths, you'll uncover traces of a forgotten rebellion. It seems the previous inhabitants were not content with the human settlers profiting from the mountain's resources.

Within The Frost Mountain's harsh landscape, there exists a hidden lesson in resilience. By withstanding its chilling trials without harm, you not only prove your strength but also demonstrate your readiness to face the challenges that lie ahead.

DC.Text_LeaderboardContentDesc_EscapeArtist: The Escape Artist score is based on the number of successful escapes from a dungeon divided by the number of matches played in the related High-Roller dungeon.
DC.Text_LeaderboardContentDesc_KillerOutlaw: The Killer Outlaw score is based on the number of PvP kills from the High-Roller dungeons divided by the number of matches played in the related High-Roller dungeon. Kills are only counted when you successfully extract from the dungeon.
DC.Text_LeaderboardContentDesc_Slayer_BossA: The Boss Slayer score is based on the number of times the player has the killing blow against a boss divided by the number of matches played in the related High-Roller dungeon. Kills are only counted when you successfully extract from the dungeon.
DC.Text_LeaderboardContentDesc_Slayer_CaveT: The Cave Troll Slayer score is based on the number of times the player has the killing blow against the Cave Troll divided by the number of matches played in the related High-Roller dungeon.
DC.Text_LeaderboardContentDesc_Slayer_Ghost: The Ghost King Slayer score is based on the number of times the player has the killing blow against the Ghost King divided by the number of matches played in the related High-Roller dungeon.
DC.Text_LeaderboardContentDesc_Slayer_Lich: The Lich Slayer score is based on the number of times the player has the killing blow against the Lich divided by the number of matches played in the related High-Roller dungeon.
DC.Text_LeaderboardContentDesc_TreasureColl: Treasure items are items you can sell to The Collector. The Treasure Collector score is compiled based on the value of new treasure extracted from the dungeon divided by the number of matches played in the related High-Roller dungeon.
DC.Text_LeaderboardContentDesc_VeteranAdven: The adventure score is accrued by accomplishing various tasks within the dungeon and successfully escaping. The score is calculated by dividing the total score by the number of matches played in the related High-Roller dungeon. Players increase their adventure score by killing monsters, killing enemy players, opening chests, acquiring new loot, and escaping the dungeon. Going deeper into the dungeon, killing bosses and subbosses, and looting rare chests give higher Adventure points. Dying in the dungeon forfeits all Adventure points from that session and also incurs penalty points.

DC.Text_UI_WB_MenuOptionsLink_Desc:
The platform link features allows a user to link a previous account to a new platform. Supported platforms are shown on the left. Platforms that are linked to this account will display an identifier key. This identifier key is NOT the link-code.

Instructions on linking this account to a new platform.
1. Generate a temporary unique ‘Link-Code’ by pressing the ‘Get Link-Code’ button. The code will appear hidden to protect your account. DO NOT REVEAL THIS CODE TO ANYONE.
2. Press the ‘Copy’ button to have the code copied to your system memory.
3. Close the game and then open Dark and Darker on the new platform you wish to link this account.

Linking the account to a brand-new platform with no characters created.
a. If the new platform has no account associated with it (i.e. no character was ever created), then a ‘Link Account’ popup will appear when you log into the game. Follow the Link Account instructions and paste the copied Link-Code when prompted. Once you successfully link an account you will advance to the character selection screen for your original account.

Linking the account to a platform that you accidentally created a character on.
a. If you accidentally created a character on the new platform, you need to first delete ALL characters on the new platform before linking your original account. You can delete a character by going to the main ‘Character Select’ menu and pressing the ‘Delete Character’ button.
b. Once all characters are deleted on the account restart the game on the new platform and follow the instructions above.
<ImportantText>c. It is not possible to link a previous account to the new platform account if Redstones were ever purchased on the new platform account, even if all characters have been removed. We recommend creating another account on the new platform if you wish to transfer to that platform in this instance.</>

DC.Text_Reward_Rank_EA02_Demigod_Flavor: Its icy exterior shimmers with a celestial glow, promising a taste of the frost-kissed wonders that lie within.
DC.Text_Reward_Rank_EA02_Exemplar_Flavor: Casting a captivating display of frost and fire, its glacial blue flames flicker with an otherworldly allure, transforming any campsite into a mystical sanctuary amidst the frozen wilderness.
DC.Text_Reward_Rank_EA02_Pathfinder_Flavor: From the icy depths of death, this undead monstrosity trudges forth, spreading the cold touch of doom.
DC.Text_Reward_Rank_EA02_Voyager_Flavor: This flame is rumored to be forged from the tears of winter spirits and infused with the essence of ancient frost dragons, imbuing it with an aura both chilling and enchanting.
DC.Text_Reward_Rank_EA03_Demigod_Flavor: Pulsating with sinister dark energies that thirst to unleash their malevolent influence, this heart mirrors the corruption that consumed the mighty King of the Forgotten Castle in his pursuit of immortality. What hidden darkness will it awaken in you?
DC.Text_Reward_Rank_EA03_Exemplar_Flavor: Emitting the colors of the ancient Elven woods, this magical fire fills the air with an irresistible mix of herbal scents and sweet aromas from their revered trees, enchanting every traveler who draws near.
DC.Text_Reward_Rank_EA03_Pathfinder_Flavor: Once a valiant knight, the Skeleton Champion earned his medal through unmatched prowess and unwavering loyalty to the now, Ghost King. In life, he fought bravely before his sovereign; in death, he remains a spectral warrior, eternally bound to the echoes of his king’s command.
DC.Text_Reward_Rank_EA03_Voyager_Flavor: As you rest, you carve a wooden doll, every cut filled with memories of home and the hope of gifting it to a loved one, provided you make it out alive...

DC.Text_UI_WB_LeaderboardDetailPopup_Desc_N:
- Earn a ‘Seasonal Title’ through the dungeons.​

- Your Title is determined by the amount of Adventure Points (AP)
you accumulate during the season.​

- A separate ‘Title’ is calculated for each dungeon.
Your highest title is always displayed for your adventurer.​

- Earn AP by killing monsters, enemy players, opening chests and
escaping the dungeons.
AP is also determined by the value of the treasure loot that you
extract from the dungeons.
Going deeper into the dungeons, killing bosses and sub-bosses,
and looting rare chests give higher AP. ​

- An AP entry fee is subtracted from your total based on
your current Title each time you enter a dungeon. ​

- Dying in the dungeons forfeits all AP from that session.​

- Your in-game name and border will reflect your highest seasonal title.​
DC.Text_UI_WB_LoadingScreen_Loading_Tooltip:
Use your torch to light up dark areas.
Use the mouse right-click to throw your torch.

Aim for the Head! Headshots do extra damage!
Attacks to the limbs do the least damage.

You can revive a teammate if they die. Collect their ‘soul heart’ from their corpse after removing their chest armor.
Find a sacrificial altar with their ‘soul heart’ equipped and make a small blood sacrifice.

A portal closes as soon as someone passes through it.
Sometimes it’s better to let an enemy open a portal, then steal it for yourself!

To cast a spell as a magic caster, make sure you equip the 'Spell Memory' skill. Magic casters can select their spell in-game by 
holding down their 'Spell Memory' skill key. Equip a magic weapon and hold down the right mouse to cast your spell.
Sell the loot you collect in the dungeon to the right merchant to build up your coffers.

You must aim your shield to block an attack. Look up to block a downward slash. If an attack hits a body part that sticks 
out like the top of your head, you will still take damage even if the weapon bounces off your shield.

DC.Text_UI_WB_Login_WelcomeText:
Early Access Hotfix #59

This update introduces the new matchmaking system. Please understand that this is still a work in progress, and we will continue to tweak and polish it to enable the best match quality without compromising wait times. When you click on the matchmaking button, you will no longer be placed into the pre-lobby base camp. Instead, you will remain in the main menu while we utilize the new matchmaking system to find you the best suitable match.

We will do our best to create sessions with similar gear scores based on the highest member on the team. Please note that during off-peak time the range of the matches may vary substantially. We will be collecting data during this time to improve our matchmaking logic for the future. Please note that we will continue matching players with less than 25 gear score (Normal dungeons) in their own matching pool to help onboard newer players.

Finally, we have added a quick match system that allows a non-full squad the ability match together with random teammates. We have added some protective measures to disincentivize intentional killing random teammates. The dungeon recovery system automatically returns any equipped items taken out of the dungeon by a teammate so intentional team killers cannot reap ill gotten gains. Players that are reported for ‘team-killing’ will lose karma and will not be able to enter the matching pool for a limited time. This time will exponentially increase each time they are reported for intentional team killing.  We will be keeping a close eye on these new systems as we continue to improve the game and see you in the dungeons!
